üòä In an effort to encourage families to get outside, exercise, and have a little fun, Coach Barben has set up a multi-city 'Vista Rocks' Easter hunt. She painted 100 rocks with inspirational phrases or words on them and on the back side #vistarocks.

She has placed them all over Ivins, Santa Clara, St George, Washington, Bloomington, Little Valley areas, etc. along walking/biking trails, neighborhoods, sidewalks, parks, and hiking trails. Students are encouraged throughout the week to look for them as they are outside. If you find one please take a picture and post it on social media with the tag #VistaRocks and/or email it to mbarben@vistautah.com. These may be exchangeable for treats once school resumes.

"My goal with this is to get students out exercising but also to create a little bit of community awareness about Vista. If other people find the rocks they will know that Vista rocks!üòä"
